original_text: They met with Annas who was the most important priest. Caiaphas, John and Alexander were also there. Other men from the family of the most important priest were with them too.
korean_text: 대제사장 안나스와 가야바와 요한과 알렉산더와 및 대제사장의 문중이 다 참여하여

sentences.original_text: who was the most important priest
Caiaphas, John and Alexander were also there
Other men from the family of the most important priest
sentences.korean_translation: 가장 중요한 제사장의 가문에서 온 다른 사람들도
